text: Vistry Group, formerly Bovis Homes Group, is a British house-building company based in Kings Hill, England. Bovis Homes bought Galliford Try's housing arm in January 2020. The combined business is called Vistry. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is in the FTSE 100 Index. It mostly builds homes for housing associations, local councils and big rental landlords â€” rather than for private sale. It built 7,750 homes in the year to June 2024. ==References== Category:Housing in the United Kingdom
title: Vistry
